artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Author: Kōkyōan Kasen; Publisher: Ōhashiya Yashichi; Carver: Egawa Ichigorō

description: yellow cover; black and white images of gruff looking men with weapons, many wearing sumptuously decorated clothing, others tattooed; text with images
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Embroidered Portraits of Characters from the ‘Tales of the Water Margin’ (Shūzō suiko meimeiden 繡像水滸銘々傳)
title: Embroidered Portraits of Characters from the ‘Tales of the Water Margin,’ vol. 2
